message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you, and this is a very competitive price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could come down to $9,000, which I believe is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,750. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
